title: Introduction to C Programming
desc: Discover the fundamentals of C programming in this introductory course. Learn syntax, data structures, and algorithms to build your coding skills.

title: Introduction to Algorithms
desc: Explore the world of algorithms. Master problem-solving, algorithm design, and analysis. Unlock the key to efficient coding and problem-solving strategies

title: Introduction to C++ for DSA
desc: Learn C++ for Data Structures and Algorithms. Build a strong foundation in C++ programming while mastering essential concepts for efficient problem-solving.

title: Basic Data Structures
desc: Master foundational data structures. Dive into arrays, linked lists, stacks, and queues. Develop essential skills for efficient data manipulation and problem-solving.

title: Introduction to OOP Python
desc: Unlock object-oriented Python. Explore classes, inheritance, and encapsulation. Build a solid foundation for creating modular, efficient, and maintainable code.

title: Software Engineering
desc: Delve into Software Engineering. Learn design patterns, project management, and coding practices. Develop skills to create robust, scalable, and efficient software solutions.

title: AWS, Cloud Computing
desc: Discover AWS and Cloud Computing. Dive into cloud services, infrastructure as code, and scaling. Gain expertise in managing and optimizing cloud-based solutions.

title: Database (MYSQL)
desc: Explore MySQL Database. Learn SQL, database design, and management. Acquire skills to build, query, and maintain efficient relational databases for various applications.

title: Problem-Solving Part
desc: Enhance problem-solving skills. Develop critical thinking, analytical, and creative problem-solving approaches. Solve real-world challenges with confidence and precision.
